title: Can't log on?
body:
Got dc'd during a normal teambuilder game, waited about a minute to reconnect, exited game and client.

Closed the stream I was watching (Proof that my isp was not the issue), try to re-log. Waits 2 minutes before saying it cant then closing the client.

I suspect I will probably get a low priority queue for this. Why? What am I supposed to do? 

Still watching the stream btw

(Screenshot. Stream in backround to confirm it is relevant.)

replies.body: Yea i just got disconnected from my ranked.. and cant log in

Your not alone. I'm seeing other threads pop up.

So hopefully, loss forgiven.
Sucks bc last time when i contacted riot about something like this still got the loss.
Same here it's not just you I'm still trying to log in I was at the start of an ARAM match when I got disconnected

Ah ok.

I was not looking forward to low priority queue.

You're probably better off sending in a ticket about it, these help & support boards look barren I doubt it gets enough attention for problem fixes. I'm just gonna play a different game in the mean time and wait for league of legends to leaverbuster me again when I finally get to log in. {{champion:32}}
